Reviews.Title: “good value,staff and location”
Reviews.Author: gerry2671
Reviews.Content: 5 minute walk from Sants station, very good staff and superb breakfast. it is a little way out if walking but get the train. very quiet area but near shops and bars if you feel lazy. seem to be finishing off an upgrade outside with a cool looking pool. very good value for money,had to pay 2 euros a day for a kettle tho, europeans don't understand our tea addiction!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and place”
Reviews.Author: PuravShah
Reviews.Content: Excellent place and excellent staff to help out.Very close to local amenities and good thing was the staff was very helpful even at late night when we wanted vegetarian snacks. The room decor was amazing.

Reviews.Title: “Overall good, although location not ideal and lacking character”
Reviews.Author: chrisandsarah_11
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have just returned from a 5 day stay in Barcelona. We chose the hotel because we thought from previous reviews that it was a safe option and close enough to walk into town. Unfortunately, it was further out than we thought (both in terms of distance and character - i.e. it feels a bit like it's in the suburbs - being near one of the mainline traln stations). For example, there are no/very few decent restaurants nearby. The hotel is nice enough, with friendly and helpful staff. Rooms are clean, although not very spacious, to be honest. Whilst this is quite a personal comment, we felt that the hotel lacks character - the lobby, bar area, restaurant, rooms etc. In terms of locaton, it is 30 minutes walk to Placa Catalunya (at the top of the Rambla) and about an hour's walk to the Port. If you don't mind travelling into town by metro, the connections are good. The Sagrada Famlia is 5 stops away on 1 line, and the Rambla is 5 stops away on another. The metro station (Barcelona Sants) is 10 minutes walk door to door from the hotel. It may be a popular option for many - especially if you get a good deal staying there. And it is definitely very functional, pretty modern and clean. But next time we go to Barcelona, we'll probably go for somewhere closer to old town, Jaume or Barceloneta, with a bit more character.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely stay”
Reviews.Author: MARIE B
Reviews.Content: My husband and myself stayed at H10 ITACA from 3rd APRIL to 8th APRIL. Room 614. We had a wonderful welcome on check-in. We stayed in a superior room. The only hitch was that the right bedside lamp was not functioning. Room was very clean and breakfast superb. Our room assistant was Aurora. I would certainly recommend it to my clients. Marie

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: MPerrylxx
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel last weekend. Went to watch Barca play in Camp Nou. I've read all the good reviews about this hotel before we went there, and was very happy to confirm the good reviews are all true. Friendly staff, clean rooms, high quality breakfast, excellent location. We will definately stay there again. One more thing as a reminder, if you are watching a late Barca game, forget about taxi or metro (no chance of getting any), just walk back to the hotel, no problem. We loved our stay. Highly recommonded this hotel to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Happy we chose it!”
Reviews.Author: Catherine X
Reviews.Content: I stayed at H10 Itaca for 6 nights in Barcelona for my honeymoon. There are several highlights for this business-chain hotel: Superb location (3 mins walk from Sant train/metro station), very good buffet breakfast and nice clean room! Plus The hotel staff were very friendly. The only problem we had was the noise from our "neighbor", you can easily hear what they were talking and doing cause these 4 rooms cramp together at the end of the hall way, we had a group of hype students for 2 days but that was it. If you are looking for a fancy and chic hotel, this is not the one, but if you wants convenience, comfort and security in a foreign city, this one matches your expectation.

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel in a good location”
Reviews.Author: Anand_Muralidharan
Reviews.Content: I stayed at H10 while I was in Barcelona for a conference. The location of the hotel is excellent - less than 30 minutes from the airport, very close to the Barcelona Sants terminal and walking distance from Fira Montjuic. The hotel staff were very friendly. However the hotel itself leaves a lot to be desired. For the price, the rooms were dark and dingy. AC never worked properly in my room. When the hotel was at full occupancy there was no access to wireless internet. A business class hotel with less than adequate internet capacity is unacceptable. If not for the location, this hotel is best avoided.

Reviews.Title: “Very Loud”
Reviews.Author: Ingrid D
Reviews.Content: Breakfast was good. Lots of choices and available from 7-10:30AM. The rooms are fine, but there must not be any insulation in the walls so not only do you get noise from the street you also get a lot of noise from the other rooms. The bed was not that comfortable. The hotel is very close to the Metro and Train station. If you arrive before check-in time they will hold your bags for you.

Reviews.Title: “¡Muy bíen!”
Reviews.Author: Love0206
Reviews.Content: We stayed at H10 Itaca on 3&4 Mar 12 for a birthday trip. We chose H10 Itaca because of the good reputation. In fact, H10 Itaca is much better than our expectations! Firstly, the location of H10 Itaca is perfect! Only 5 mins walking distance from Barcelona Sants Train Station. Inside the hotel, the room is clean, comfortable and big enough. Buffet breakfast is excellant! Both quality & qualty are good! Lastly and perhaps is the most important is very good customer services! Staff are friendly, helpful and good in English! We are deeply appreciated the birthday surprise from H10 Itaca! :) We like H10 Itaca very much and we will choose H10 again in our future trips! :)

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel for the price”
Reviews.Author: David T
Reviews.Content: The hotel is a little bit away from the main sights of Barcelona, but we enjoy walking so this was not a problem. It is very well designed and has an air of quality - aided by the free glass of champagne on arrival. Overall, for the price, this hotel was excellent and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “H10 for city stay”
Reviews.Author: ylaid
Reviews.Content: just spent 4 days at the h10 itaca, very clean, good rooms, excellent breakfast, friendly staff and very helpful reception. Good location walking distance from Barcelona sants station, train from airport 3.60 euros then out of front of station keep big hotel with sony mast on roof on your right, look straight ahead and you can see red brick building hotel itaca is the next building. found metro easy and used open top buses, take a cardi or jacket on buses if you want to go on top deck, we returned yesterday 8/3/2012 day time temps 17 - 20 so nice and mild but temps drop in evening to about 5 so you need a fleece or coat. Barcelona is great, wear comfy shoes, we walked a lot, take care crossing roads, traffic,bikes mopeds seem to come from all directions.

Reviews.Title: “Ideal for visiting Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Jasper065
Reviews.Content: Very nice - smart and tidy, with friendly staff. Breakfast is of a very high standard with a huge choice to suit all nationalities; the set dinner is a little pretentious but still enjoyable and value for money; and the bar is fine after a long day doing the sights (though the indoors part is a little small and can get full). Well located, with a train/metro/bus interchange close by (though hordes of taxis constantly pass by the front entrance). Even the airport is only a €20 taxi ride away. Also well placed also for Camp Nou (but I wouldn't recommend walking it unless immediately after a match, when all the taxis are full).

Reviews.Title: “Weekend for the footy”
Reviews.Author: Mark R
Reviews.Content: I travelled with my son to Barcelona to see Barca v Real Sociedad and has it was our first visit I was just a little aprehensive re finding the Hotel and subsequently getting to the ground. However, the Hotel was only a 5 minute walk from the main station and 20 minutes (walking) from the the Hotel to the Nou Camp, which was ideal. The hotel staff were freindly and informative and the faccilties were in line with our expectation. We plan to there again later this year. Mark

Reviews.Title: “3 Days in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Reiven
Reviews.Content: Barcelona is always amazing. An excellent choice to pay a visit anytime you had the chance. Contains both entertainment and cultural experiences. A place to live ;)

Reviews.Title: “A convenient and economical hotel”
Reviews.Author: zhang j
Reviews.Content: From the Barcelona train station is very close, the hotel room is clean and comfortable, front desk staff were very enthusiastic.

Reviews.Title: “Good value and comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Amber C
Reviews.Content: Really nice, clean and comfortable, room. Very helpful and friendly staff. Near the main train station, useful metro lines, the Camp Nou and Montjuic but quite a walk to the Ramblas and other central attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: burrito_of_london
Reviews.Content: The room was small, but the hotel was close to the train station, I didn't pay much and I slept extremely well.

Reviews.Title: “Great New Year's day in Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: Zuzana K
Reviews.Content: We are very happy about our stay in hotel H10 Itaca in Barcelona. So, we would like to share our experience. We had a great time. We decided to spend New Year’s Day in Barcelona and I can say that we enjoyed our trip also thanks to our hotel. The hotel is situated next to the railway station and it’s also near to all tourist attractions. We really appreciated welcoming staff of the hotel. The hotel is calm, clean, with good services. We enjoyed the time in jacuzzi which is placed on the roof, generous breakfast, big bad in the room and all services. We appreciated as well nice attention from hotel direction to offer as a small bottle of Spanish sparkling wine and 12 grapes for midnight. We would like to recommend this hotel for your stay in Barcelona, you wouldn’t regret your choice.

Reviews.Title: “good location away from the main tourist drag”
Reviews.Author: katycrunchie
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel when visiting Barcelona to watch football at the Nou Camp Hotel was clean and good standard. The staff on reception were very helpful We preferred this location to more touristy area nr ramblas. It is very close to Sants station where you can get train to the airport and also around Barcelona on the metro, was very easy to get to nou camp from here Breakfast in hotel was excellent It is also close walking distance to Plaza Espana and the shopping centre there Only downside to area is there a few bars nearby

Reviews.Title: “Nice!”
Reviews.Author: VadymSusayev
Reviews.Content: Nice hotel, with professional personnel. Little problem with keys was resolved quickly.

Reviews.Title: “great value”
Reviews.Author: thinkspot
Reviews.Content: We were very impressed with this hotel. Clean and modern style, with great service from the front desk to the excellent restaurant (the best buffet breakfast I've ever had - total quality). The location was great - 5 minute walk from the central train station (15 minute metro to the airport and beyond, or a quick metro ride to Sagrada Famiilia and more) and about an interesting 30 minute walk to Las Ramblas and other shopping areas, though there are certainly lots of cafes and shops even closer. Free wi-fi too.

Reviews.Title: “Its everything they say it is, you will love it”
Reviews.Author: wavesinekas
Reviews.Content: The room is wonderful, the breakfast is one of the best hotel breakfasts you will have anywhere in the world and the staff are extremely helpful and friendly. We extended by one night as we found it just so easy to be here, we are here now, and we are just so pleased we chose this hotel. The train station is so close it makes travel so convenient. What a pleasure to be here. Sometimes the sauna is not turned on so if you want to use it be sure to plan ahead so that its hot when you need it. Otherwise, no complaints at all, we would stay here again in a flash!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely hotel, friendly staff, a perfect weekend hotel”
Reviews.Author: Petem1955
Reviews.Content: This hotel is well located, and the staff are lovely. One tip - walk rather than use the metro. We found late into our stay just how close the hotel is to the parks and shopping centre (the old bullring). Very comfy bed and excellent breakfast. Good value too.

Reviews.Title: “Great city, great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cristian B
Reviews.Content: I have arrived in the morning at the hotel as I have disembarked from the cruise ship at 8.00, so therefore I was at the hotel at 10.00 AM. We have booked two rooms, the receptionist was very amiable and gave us the room key for one of the rooms, so we could leave our luggage there - no extra charge for warly check-in. We went to discover on our own the beautiful city of Barcelona and when we came back, the second room was ready. The reception personnel is very helpful and provides you all the maps and details of Barcelona you need. The hotel is very close to the main train station in Barcelona, in fact we saw the Barcelo Sants station from our room. If you prefer having intimacy and a quiet night, it is prpbably better for you to book a room facing the back of the hotel, but we got the room facing the main boulevard (Av. de Roma) and it was great, the lights, the bustling city, everything. We enjoyed the view from the room. Breakfast is rich and very tasty, very good strong coffee. The breakfast room is situated on the first floor of the building. The lift is rather slow, but safe. The next day we left our luggage at the luggage room until late in the afternoon - we have checked-out normally at 11.00 o'clock, but we continued our visit to Barcelona, so the luggages remained at the hotel until in the evening. Again the personnel was very amiable and when we came back after the luggage they thanked us for the stay and invited us again, everything with a big smile on their faces.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: HartSus
Reviews.Content: Enjoyed two nights here, stayed on 7th floor, WiFi worked fine. Huge windows looking out to Montjuic, room was quiet, spotless and very comfy. Enjoyed our complimentary cava and welcome chocolates. Thanks H10!

Reviews.Title: “Business Hotel in BCN”
Reviews.Author: Riojawikinger
Reviews.Content: Hotel was booked by our travel office without me checking where it was located. Location was ok, the neighborhood was fine but noisy. Overall Hotel was fine, rooms ok, no carpet, which i find very good for hotel rooms. Walls of the rooms are quite thin; people next door to me had a baby and a heard it crying most of the last night i was there.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and very good breakfast”
Reviews.Author: dieter d
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very clean, breakfast was simply fantastic. Staff is friendly and helpful. About 5 minutes walk to the railway and metro station Estacio Sants. We had a nice stay.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and fantastic customer service”
Reviews.Author: Travel G
Reviews.Content: The customer service at this hotel is absolutely outstanding! The breakfast was fantastic. The location is right the main train station (sants) and near to two metro stations. This compensates for being a way from the beach and main shopping/eating areas. There are small cares and some restaurants nearby though. The jacuzzi and sauna were great. The bar area was nice to relax in and we got cava on arrival. Also our wifi was free and worked in our room. Not sure if it is always free though or if that was part of the deal. The best thing above all were the staff, after being in France and getting the worst service ever we were so thankful for the staff here they made us comfortable and were helpful in everyway. Above what we would expect eg. Explaining where to go, which restaurants were great and how to get to the metro.

Reviews.Title: “Close to Sants Estació”
Reviews.Author: EdiIonescu
Reviews.Content: If you go to Barcelona to tan on the beach - it's too far. On the other hand to visit and discover Barcelona - the location is perfect. Good city hotel , clean, good breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “good hotel”
Reviews.Author: denSidmouth
Reviews.Content: The best thing about this hotel is the lovely breakfast and cheery helpful waiting staff in the l morning ,really good start for your day ! room fine ,reception staff ok some more helpful than others ! laura in the bar area also really excellent customer service ,nothing too much trouble and it makes such a difference to have excellent customer service with a smile ! the bad part - please be very careful your entire stay in barcelona pickpockets are everywhere so dont let it spoil your break ,I honestly recommend you get a taxi from the airport its not worth the hassle for 22 euro (we got the taxi back !) when you arrive and you all your valuables and documents ,we had several attempts firstly a person squirted makeup over us both outside at the sans station near the hotel,apparantly this scam is to distract you whilst you clean up the " bird mess " they steal I knew of this ,so we just hastily continued to the hotel and ignored any comments from "helpful " persons ,this wasnt a nice start and we had to clean up when we got there . Another instance someone on a motorbike tried to grab my daughters bag she was lucky ,also do not sign any petition anywhere ever ! again its just a distraction .The police are working really hard and arresting people all the time when we there and I would say dont let this put you off Barcelona its beautiful and has so so much to see .Once there then use the excellent metro get a few day ticket its very good value you can choose how many days ,you can buy this ticket from the information booth as you exit the airport and the hotel is very well connected .There is a supermarket next door very convenient The receptionist advised us of some lovely restaurants nearby a 5-10 minute walk, with a shopping mall the chinese,and japenese were excellent ,fantastic tapas in the gotic quater , seafood on the seafront and barcelona generally -yum ! Sadly the jacuzzi wasnt working very well I think it needs replacing Overall a very good value base to explore Barcelona I would definitely stay here again

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!”
Reviews.Author: PaulandLauraGraham
Reviews.Content: We can not praise this hotel highly enough for their excellent customer service during our stay at the H10 Itaca Hotel. We had our bag stolen near to Sants train station just before we arrived at the hotel on the first day. Be really careful to keep hold of your luggage no matter what scam is trying to be pulled. Barcelona is notorious for bag snatching, pick pocketers but we were not prepared for being hustled... Anyway we lost almost everything, passports, money, phones, keys. The H10 Itaca hotel staff were amazing allowing us to call our banks, mobile phone companies, to call home to let them know what happened and to help us with the Police and liaising with the British Consulate to get temporary passports (£95 each!!!) They gave us a free lunch as we had spent most of the day at the police station and had no money and also provided champagne in our room, which was a really lovely touch . They also helped us sort out the Nou Camp experience which we had pre paid for but had had our debit card stolen too so couldn't collect the tickets Its about 25min walk to Les Ramblas and about a 15min walk to Esplanade where there are shops, more 'local' restaurants which were lovely and the Art museum and amazing fountains. All in all a really lovely hotel with brilliant staff which is located not too far from all the action if you don't mind a leisurely walk or its only 5mins on tube station which is a 2min walk from the hotel. Would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Strange...”
Reviews.Author: il0ve2travel005
Reviews.Content: There's no other way to describe this property. It is very close to the train station but that's about it. There's no good restaurants nearby and the one in the hotel has a misguided notion its worthy of a Michelin star (given the lip of the staff). The room's are terribly tight (just enough space to manoeuvre around the bed) though they've put in a few amenities to give you the feeling its worth the money. The bathrooms are creaking away and show poor maintenance. I would give this one a Miss in a heartbeat and rather stay where the Pulse of Barcelona is at.

Reviews.Title: “ok hotel”
Reviews.Author: sunnyone45
Reviews.Content: stayed here with my husband for our silver wedding anniversary,its an ok hotel and great for business travellers, as its very close to the main train station and metro line, it was clean comfortable, and the outside terrace is nice, and the staff pleasant enough, and its well maintained, but its a dull chain hotel with not much character! i would recommend this hotel if you are in barcelona on business but probably not for pleasure

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay at H10 Itaca”
Reviews.Author: Miriam2205
Reviews.Content: Conveniently located, very close to the Sants, which takes you to and from the airport. Very friendly and helpful staff. We were offered a glass of cava on arrival, which was a lovely treat after travelling from Ireland. Rooms were spacious and clean. I was really looking forward to breakfast in this hotel, after reading many great reviews, and it did not disappoint. A really great selection of hot and cold food and even more cava! When I return to Barcelona I will definitely stay here again. Many thanks for a very pleasant stay.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely not a 4 star hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Agnieszka_11
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel based on excellent reviews it gets on TA. We were very dissapointed. Maybe it wouldn't be so bad if we hadn't moved into this hotel from AC Sants (on the other side of the train station) where we spent the 'working part' of our Barcelona stay. H10 Itaca is old and tired, our room looked nothing like the hotel photos, the bed was TINY and the minibar and the bar downstairs are really overpriced. Upon our arrival, we were welcomed by a strong smell of cigarettes in our room and the reception would not let us change. On top of this, the following day our room was not cleaned. If you pay 122 euros a night you expect much more, more than Itaca can offer. For this money (and location) I would recomment AC Sants where the rooms are nice and modern, the beds big and comfortable and the minibar is free.

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel”
Reviews.Author: E5
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the H10 Itaca Hotel in Barcelona for two nights. The reception at check-in was marvelous -- how many hotels offer you champagne during check-in? Checking in was quite fast and easy, my only niggle is that the young man who checked me in announced my room number out loud, but that appears to be a European habit as I've seen it done in most European countries. The room was nice, quite clean, A/C worked well. It had a "blackout" curtain that could be drawn to completely block outside light. I think this is the first hotel I've seen that in, and I LOVE it! My stay was fairly quiet after about 8 at night. Room service was very fast and very good, as was the restaurant service the second night of my stay. Breakfasts were amazing. My only gripes were really quite small; the telephone in the room felt like cheap plastic, and the thing with the room number at check-in that wasn't best practices. Other than that, I will definitely stay here the next time I'm in Barcelona!

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel, great location will def be coming back.”
Reviews.Author: hols.away
Reviews.Content: This hotel is quite good. breakfast buffet was amazing for 10 euros- cereals, breads, cakes, full english, yoghurts- anything you like really, the room is clean and tidy although they dont change your sheets everyday they do freshen them up- i know some people dont like tht but they were so ez going tht if u asked for ur sheets to be changed theyd do it. They give you millions of towels for the jacuzzi, bath, hair anything, they do always try to have good customer service, theres even a trouser press in the room but tea and coffe making facilities would prob hav been more useful. The reception staff were v helpful with giving the free wifi code, with directions and ideas for food and sights. The welcome sparkling wine was a nice touch. The jacuzzi was great as i travelled with 1 other person.. they have 2 deck chairs and it just feels like a lovely isolated space, not so great if its already occupied thou it is really only for one group otherwise its just too awkward. two metro stops nearby was so convenient to get around barcelona becasue of this esp as the metro runs all nite on sats. the 2-5 day public transport pass is amazing... got to all the sites we wanted to for cheap and at barcelona sants station which is 5 mins walk there is the 3 euro airport direct bus. dont ask the receptionists they have no clue about tht but was a nice cheap way to get to airport and so convenient. tapes tapas which is on the other side of the barcelona sants station also does cheap but good food and they sometimes do stuff thts not on the menu - just ask... but do get there early if u want paella. cerverceria catalana near diagonal station is a famous tapas place in barca also- evryone will recommend it and it is very good- try something new- u wont regret it- overall barcelona and h10 itaca- see you soon.

Reviews.Title: “Recommend!!!! One of the best hotel in Barcelona!!!”
Reviews.Author: TLV38
Reviews.Content: all the staff in hotel are very friendly and kindly , nice and quite hotel.highly recommed. We stayed in this hotel for 4 nights and had an excellent experience. Location: less than 7 minute walking from the Sants metro station. Service was good, helpful staff. The room was nice and clean. WiFi in the rooms is free,and there is a computer connected to the internet in the lobby that guests can use. We strongly recommend it! thank you Jordy :) Ron and Taryn

Reviews.Title: “great hotel, recommended!”
Reviews.Author: eiriksemb
Reviews.Content: stayed there for a week in august. Great, clean room, great staff, delicious breakffast. It was located a little outside the tourist centre, but near a stop of the impressive metro-system in Barca

Reviews.Title: “Nice clean hotel at a great price”
Reviews.Author: TravelinShane
Reviews.Content: I recently had a poor experience with H10, but decided to give them another chance. I'm glad I did. The service at this hotel is exemplary. The rooms are a bit small (even for European standards) - but are decorated nicely. A/C works very well and the views from the 7th floor are really nice. Breakfast is yummy and they have free internet (although the wifi didnt work on the 7th floor during my stay). I could use the cable or use the wifi in the lobby. Nice outdoor deck in the lobby too. There is an ATM and a Supermarket in the same building. Very helpful. And it's right near the main train station (although a bit far from Exaimple and Ramblas). Figure 30 minutes of brisk walking to get there - or you can take one of the metro stops 5 minutes away. Worth a stay if you are in Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “Overall very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sketchbg
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a city break, four days and found it to be well suited to it's role; an efficient, well run city hotel. Staff were helpful, rooms clean and perfectly adequate in size. Restaurant was very nice and well priced for the quality, surprised it wasnt busier! Only small point was lack of a pool, jacuzzi was fine but only if you were the only people there not really enough space for more than a couple of people! Overall though very good hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Very good, but not quite perfect”
Reviews.Author: Guitar_George
Reviews.Content: As other reviewers have reported, this is a good hotel, with good staff, in a good location for connections to the Barcelona rail and Metro sytem. However, because it is in a residential area, there are very few restaurants nearby and, as a result, you will probably end up eating in the hotel, which is good, but has a limited menu. You should also be aware (as others have reported) whilst the rooms higher up are to a higher standard and are nice, the free Wi-Fi doesn't seem to work. We stayed on the 3rd and 6th floors and found the Wi-Fi worked well on the 3rd floor but didn't work on the 6th floor or in the reception or the bar area on the ground floor.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect staying”
Reviews.Content: Staying at hotel h10 itaca in barcelona was an excellent expirience. If i come back to barcelona i will stay there again. The staff was very kind and helpfull and the hotel location and premises were perfect!

Reviews.Title: “A very good hotel with closeness to the Sants Station”
Reviews.Author: djjaguar
Reviews.Content: Hotel: The hotel is located close to the Sants Train and metro station about a 5 or 10 minute walk. Right next to the hotel is a full fledged Supermarket which is ideal to stock up on water, etc if you do not want to use the hotels room fridge items. I was looking for a pool but did not see one. I would recommend the pool be located on the main floor in the back where there is a beautiful patio lounge. Staff; Ivan at the front desk was very professional and gave us alot of information about Barcelona and also made us feel very welcome. This is important as the staff of the hotel makes or breaks the image of the hotel. He should be recognised for his good work and taking the initiative. Room: We were upgraded to a Superior room since we were H10 club members. The room was perfect for us, no issues at all, clean and well maintained. I would like to thank all the staff and management at this hotel for making our stay a memorable one. Mr. J.B. from Toronto, Canada. Gym

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, location is good”
Reviews.Author: GT1974
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for 6 nights and really enjoyed the hotel. Its conveniently located for the main train station and metro lines so is easy to get around from. Also a short walk (10mins) to Espanyol and a major shopping centre. In saying that there is ahrdly any restaurants around the hotel which is probably the one drawback. Also though there is a supermarket right under the hotel which is great for picking up little bits and pieces inclding snacks and drinks. We had a double room which was slightly small in size but clean and tidy, bathroom was excellent and well stocked. The hotel also had a gym, sauna and jacuzzi spa on the roof. Jacuzzi is small only big enough for 2-3 people so if yu can get there when no one is there it is great, also sauna is turned off and need to ask staff to turn it on (which they will eventually do for you). There is a nice terrace area, and a bar which could be better used, especially if they could provide a better array of food to enjoy there, especially given the lack of restaurants in the area. The best thing though is the breakfast each morning, it was excellent and had a wide range of things. The staff are helpful and friendly and speak English. Overall woudl definitely recommend this hotel to stay again

Reviews.Title: “Definitely worth it.”
Reviews.Author: Stutistics
Reviews.Content: For it's price, this hotel is a bargain. We had a double twin room, while my parents took a double room (not as nice). The rooms are spotless, and the service - at the front desk, housekeeping as well as the breakfast buffet - very friendly and helpful! In fact, I took suggestions from the front desk about where to eat in the city, what to watch etc. and they were bang on (definitely people with good taste, haha). The hotel is in a residential part of town - but not too far from the metro station (Sants). We had a really bad experience at the metro station - got our pockets picked (and it happened to many other people in the same coach, so I cannot stress this enough - be oh so careful if you're taking the metro), so we traveled only by taxi after that - taxis are easy to come by near the hotel, it takes about 7-10 minutes on average to downtown and costs under 10 euros. The breakfast is DELICIOUS! :) Also, I loved the toiletries - what a yummy smell! About the internet - while it is free, it's so slow and frustrating you can hardly use it at all in the rooms. They do provide two PCs for use in the front lobby, and we found that convenient enough to check our mail / Facebook etc while we were on holiday, but if you're planning on working and need hi-speed internet, then you may want to figure out some alternatives. Overall, I'd go back. I liked it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Janlit
Reviews.Content: Again had a great time at thish hotel. Hotel, staff, bar all excellent. Will be going again

Reviews.Title: “" Fab Fab Fab" Hotel”
Reviews.Author: suzie49
Reviews.Content: would recommend this hotel for anyone going to Barcalona, the hotel was lovely and spotless staff very friendly. the rooms were'nt huge but furnished well there was a safe in the room( free of charge) and a well stocked mini bar with reasonable prices compared to some hotels, The breakfasts were out of this world everything you could want absolutely fabbo. Location perfect just a 5 minute walk from train station and metro, free bus takes you from the airport to the railway station for the train to Barca it is really so easy. Buy a T10 ticket for about 8euros terrific value for money as u can use it on all modes of transport, not taxis tho. Will return to Barca and will defo stay here again woulnt consider anywhere else

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel, we'llbe back next year”
Reviews.Author: alicat125
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the H10 Itaca for the weekend of the MotoGP de Cataluyna, it's our third year doing this trip (we are huge GP fans) so we knew we wouldn't be disapointed by the hotel. The staff, as usual, were attentive and friendly, check in was easy and quick and the food standard and choice at breakfast were excellent. We ate in the main restaurant one evening and as always the service was excellent and the food superb. We'll be back in 2012 to see you all again. Thank you from the Littler party.

Reviews.Title: “A Trip Full Of Surprises!”
Reviews.Author: bcoquet
Reviews.Content: I personally called this hotel many times in order to arrange our stay. Mentioned each and every single time that we are a party of three people(3 sisters) staying in one room. Upon our arrival, they had no clue and had to roll in an extra bed. When time of check out arrived, I was informed that I had to pay an extra 30 Euros per night, we stayed 7 nights. I could have stayed anywhere else in Barcelona. I chose this place because of the reviews. Will not recommend to Americans. Rooms are too small and the furniture are all worn out. Pictures looks great. Aweful gym and jaccuzi is nothing. I am comparing this place with our last year stay at Marriott Courtyard in Prague. Absolutely no comparison.

Reviews.Title: “I recommend this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Pacikk
Reviews.Content: Last weekend we stayed at this hotel. The rooms are a not big but are a good size for two persons. The hotel is a bit far off from the center - about 20/30 mins if you had to walk from the hotel to Ramblas but the hotel is very close to the Tarragon metro station which is on L3. L3 has all the main attractions - Ramblas, Pl Catalyuna, Placa Espanya, to the funicular for Montijuic. The breakfast is excellent and was worth the extra €10 per room per night.

Reviews.Title: “good chose”
Reviews.Author: tcovasna
Reviews.Content: good location - close to saints station (undergroung, trains station, bus station), 15 min walking till plaza espagna, shops near the hotel, bus stop on the corner, very good breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Fab Fab”
Reviews.Author: William2549
Reviews.Content: My hubbie and I have just returned from a trip to Barcelona, we stayed at the H10 Itaca and I have to say for convenience to all modes of public transfer this is by far the one of the best. ou can take the train straight from the airport to Sants Estacio, walk out the door and the hotel is along the road to your left Simple!!!. The hotel is spotless the rooms are a bit small but huge beds and very comfortable and furnished to a high standard, the bathroom big fluffy towels, nice toiletries, replenished daily and a brilliant shower, the bathroom is quite big. The safe for your belongings is free of charge, there is also a well stocked mini bar and by hotel charges I would say they are very reasonable. However there is a big supermarket next door which is cheaper than the mini bar prices. This is an excellent hotel to stay while in Barcelona, if I return would definately stay here. Oh and wifi is free, good great hotel, staff are very cheerful and helpful. Breakfast Brilliant hot and cold selection and beautifully displayed and plenty of it. Just a FAB Hotel

Reviews.Title: “all we could of wished for!!!!”
Reviews.Author: rover40
Reviews.Content: hotel great.food perfect.staff very polite and helpfull. location spot on.metro easy to use and very cheap.

Reviews.Title: “gave us more than we've expected”
Reviews.Author: greeny1899
Reviews.Content: friendly and kindness staff, excelent location (you can reach the city centre in 10 minutes with bus or with L5 metro) and most of the sights of Barcelona in 15-20 minutes. Bus stop - 30 sec walk, metro station - 2 minutes walk. Breakfast is excellent, there are so many options to choose.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: Margoshik
Reviews.Content: Hello! We were in the hotel for 6 nights for holidays. I wanted to say THANK you for making our holiday so wonderful and nice. My husband and I liked the hotel very much, it's very clean and in the centre of the city with nice rooms. The staff speaks good English and always were so friendly to help and explain everything we asked. And some words about Barcelona - it's a great and beautiful city. Hope we'll have the opportunity to come back some day to your city and of cause we shall choose H10 Itaca Hotel for our stay!

Reviews.Title: “H10 Itaca Hotel”
Reviews.Author: costas1234
Reviews.Content: A great hotel, well located, excellent service delivered by the staff, great breakfast selection and tasty food and drinks. The facilities in the hotel were excellent, with features such as room service, free internet facilties, a bed that was really comfortable, extra pillows and firm mattress provided, cleaning the rooms was done to a high standard and high presentation level was excellent. Nice shower the water system could have been better but still a nice shower/bath area in place. Extras such as towels, toothbrushes, soap and shower creme provided. All in all an excellent hotel in a excellent city. Both the H10 Barcelona Hotel and Barcelona the city, come highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “great hotel, very pleasant staff in a great city”
Reviews.Author: Roland0503
Reviews.Content: fine hotel wth very friendly staff, rooms in good conditions, modern style, great breakfast and fine located so that you can reach perfectly the railstation (to the airport...) and the M(etro)!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel and location with a great breakfast and pleasant staff.”
Reviews.Author: Tiger1London
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had a very enjoyable four night break in Barcelona. This was helped by the excellent hotel, friendly and helpful staff and the delicious breakfast. I chose the hotel for its handy location to the metro and Sants railway station. Our room was comfortable and the bathroom spacious. The only minor point was the lack of English speaking channels on the TV. One or two channels were occasionally available,

Reviews.Title: “Could have been better”
Reviews.Author: worktotravel100
Reviews.Content: I would have given a good review (all was good except we did not have internet in our two rooms and did not get cava at check in, all promissed services) but then there was check out... It was unfortunately on the day when there was a strike of the air controllers in the airport. The check out clerk asked us if we were going to the airport and when we said "yes" she did not say anything. We did not know at that moment about the strike (all but one channel on TV were in Spanish and the only English channel was about US business news, and remember: our internet was not working in the room) so we went to the airport. It was a mess, we end up traveling for 44 hrs. It all could have been much easier for us if only she would have told us what was going on (call it courtesy, call it customer service). I wrote about this to the hotel and never heard back...

Reviews.Title: “Just Perfect”
Reviews.Author: Sellamuthu
Reviews.Content: This hotel is a gem. We stayed here for three days and we had a fantastic stay. It was home away from home. The staff was friendly and the breakfast was simply amazing. I loved the location since Sants Estacio station was like 5 mins away. This hotel is convenient and simply perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Stylish Hotel, well located for business and pleasure, with a fabulous breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: Wrighty80
Reviews.Content: Thank you so much for a wonderful 2 night stay. Excellent location to visit Barcelona - near main station, metro and bus tour (which I highly recommend if you've not been to Barcelona and want to get around) or indeed for business. Fantastic breakfast! Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel”
Reviews.Author: xxjenzixx
Reviews.Content: An excellent hotel to stay in. Nice sized room which was kept very clean and tidy. Good service from staff who spoke excellent English. Roof top jacuzzi and sauna available to use for no extra charge- fantastic views over the city! Lovely terrace bar at the back. Walking distance from main sants train station (under 5 mins) and sants metro stop (under 3 mins). About 5 mins walking distance from a 'Touristic Barcelona' city sightseeing bus route stop, very useful for tourists. On the same road as a pharmacy, various shops, cafes and restaurants and next door to Mercadona supermarket. Free internet access (wireless and also on the computers for customer use located in reception) and easy to use safe in the bedroom. Fantastic breakfast with lots of choice-pastries, fruit, salad, cheese, ham, hot traditional english etc. Room service food was delicious and very reasonably priced. Fully stocked minibar in the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, very nice small hotel, clean and comfortable, recommended”
Reviews.Author: travels72
Reviews.Content: Great and cute hotel, clean and comfortable rooms, modern look. No much to see on TV in English, but who wants to see TV on vacation! Staff very friendly and helpful, not a complaint. Located very close to the Saints train station. Buffet breakfast is 8 Euros and its an excellent value with a huge variety of foods.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Location, Decent Hotel with Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: PuravS
Reviews.Content: Excellent hotel in all respects, except, the bar does not serve proper food after 10.30pm. Only sandwiches available, although the menu has tapas and other things, but they keep on saying, sorry kitchen closes at 10.30pm. So why not put a note under the menu saying after 10.30pm only sandwiches available. But, all in all, a very good hotel with excellent staff.

Reviews.Title: “Really nice hotel minutes away from the train station”
Reviews.Author: GlobeTrotter933
Reviews.Content: Arrived at H10 Itaca on July 15th, 2010. Only 3 minutes away from Barcelo Sants train station which is one of the main train, subway and buses station around the city. You can easily travel with your luggages from the train station to the hotel by walking. Staff was really friendly and check-in was a breeze. They offered us some water as soon as we arrived. Rooms are very nicely appointed and the bathroom is huge and very well maintained. The rooms are very comfortable and we got very good sleep on the matresses. Staff speaks Spanish, English and some of them were speaking French. We decided to try the restaurant located in the hotel on our last night. Very good food and very good service. Staff was more than polite, giving you a warm and friendly feeling. We moved away after 3 nights and were so impressed about the hotel that we came back 2 weeks after for another 2 nights. There is a grocery store located right beside the hotel. Subway stations are within walking distances. Going back to Barcelona, I will definitely go back to H10 Itaca.

Reviews.Title: “Very pleasant stay at H10 Itaca, Barcelona”
Reviews.Author: moad153
Reviews.Content: We found the H10 Itaca a pleasant hotel to stay in at a reasonable price. We booked 7 nights bed and breakfast in a double room for £454. Breakfast was extensive and meant we did not often stop anywhere for lunch. Staff were always pleasant and helpful. There is an underground supermarket right next door - very convenient. Minor niggles were. The safe battery running out (this was remedied very quickly). Wooden floor did not appear to have been swept before we came (again remedied quickly). Shower adjuster/holder too loose and bathroom extractor not working. The hotel has a good location for travel to the airport via Barcelon Sants Railway Station and to all the sites of interest via the Metro. The location is not ideal for a beach holiday as it is a 20 min or so walk to the beach front. Also, rooms facing main road can be noisy with window open.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cran4
Reviews.Content: This is the standard hotel recommended by my company nearby and it really is excellent. Although not massive it is very friendly and the staff take their jobs seriously and seem content to help with anything you need. On arrival I was taken aback by their expectation of my turning up - it often seems to be an unnerving surprise! Restaraunt is small but very good, and it has great rooms. You are about 20 mins walk from the Arts Museum/Olympic area, and 30 mins from the centre (Rambles area).

Reviews.Title: “Very good value. Nothing lacking.”
Reviews.Author: mike47TelAviv_Israel
Reviews.Content: The location is not central, but extremely convenient to train and metro stations. The rooms are large by Spanish 4 star standards, well appointed and comfortable. The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Compared to the prices in the center of town, this place is a bargain and well worth the money (under 100 Euros). I would definitely go back there again.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: IvanaCroatia
Reviews.Content: We stayed in this hotel for five nights and we can recomend it to everyone who wants be far away from the city noise and close enough to the center. It's only five minutes walk from the main train station Sants - if you are coming from the airport there is a train that goes direct to the Sants station. Metro station is in front of the train station so you need 10 minutes to get in the centre and to all great sigts of Barcelona. If you like to walk,20-30 minutes of easy walk will get you to the centre.Service is great, everybody speak english very good, food is great and if we go in Barcelona again, this will be our choice.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, clean good!”
Reviews.Author: Intelins
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Itaca for 3 nights during a business trip. The rooms are a bit small but very clean and tidy. The Hotel features an amazing jacuzzi on top of the hotel, in openair, offering a view over the roofs of Barcelona. Breakfast is very good and served already at 6:30 and 7:00 which is great if you are in town for business and need to leave early...or when you come back from one of these great Barcelona party nights ;) My only negative point was that the A/C did not work and the room air thus appeared a bit sticky... But a recommendable Hotel to anybody who travels to Barcelona. The internet wireless is really for free! Not like other hotels that talk about free wireless internet and charge for it! A big plus!

Reviews.Title: “Value x price”
Reviews.Author: Jtx2000
Reviews.Content: The Hotel is located near the main station (saints stació) and is very small, but the rooms are comfortable and the staff is very committed.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable hotel for business and freetime”
Reviews.Author: Huuhkaja
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel with a group of business colleagues. Staff at reception was very friendly and accommodating and asked us to sit down at the terrace and wait until our rooms were ready. Cava - sparkling wine - offered as a complimentary by the hotel - nice touch. I recommend to book superior room, as I had it during my stay. It is located on top floors, street noise is minimized, hallways and rooms are in good condition. All in all our group was satisfied to our stay in this hotel and I recommend it as an alternative choice for Barcelona stay. Pros: + Friendly and accommodating staff. They greeted every time and were always ready to help about choosing restaurant, to book tickets for concerts and sport events. + Bartender at the evenings. Social and very good service. + Terrace at backyard. + Superior room is clean and in good condition and enough roomy to settle down. Remember this is Barcelona where rooms are usually small. + Bedcomfort was ok. + Buffet breakfast, ok choices between cold and warm dishes. + 2-3 min walk for two railway/ metrostations. + Small terrace at the roof with few sun beds. + Small jacuzzi at the roof terrace. Cons: - Buffet breakfast could have more options. - Superior room didn´t offer bath rope and slippers as promised at the booking through their website. - Location might be to far for exploring Barcelona. However taxis are cheap in Spain for short city hopping. Taxi ride was 6€ at the evening from Placa de la Carbonera near Maremagnum. Taxi to the airport about 28€. - Connection problems with free WiFi at top floor room. However it worked at the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “H10 ITACA”
Reviews.Author: PANOS21
Reviews.Content: It was very close to the central station (Sants Estacio), and the staff were very helpful and friendly. Very clean the room.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel, great location”
Reviews.Author: IgorKushnir
Reviews.Content: The hotel is great for leisure trip - located only 3 minutes walking distance from Barcelona Sants (Sants Estacio) - international train / metro station. The service stuff is great and helpfull, the spa is nice, breakfast is good. The room is very clean and nice. The only problem is the door to neigbour room which located near your bed - you can hear every single word that said in other room... it is really disturbing...

Reviews.Title: “Good location, average conditions”
Reviews.Author: Nimb
Reviews.Content: After staying, during my trip to Barcelona, at this hotel, I can say that there is nothing fancy about it, just a decent place to sleep and eat. The location might me its strong point, as it is very close to Sants station, a transport hub for trains and subway; also there are bus stops just in front of the hotel. The room is ok regarding size and cleanliness, but it doesn't make you feel like home at all. The breakfast is nothing special, but a tipical buffet with cereals, pastry, fruits, vegetables, meat and cheese and some cooked eggs; the quality is decent, and if you can disregard the not so nice face of the personnel, it's ok. Also, there is free internet available in the lobby, but if you would like to weight your luggage before leaving for the airport, you have to pay for it. In conclusion, it's worth staying only if you get a good rate for the room.

Reviews.Title: “quite good”
Reviews.Author: silversurfer911
Reviews.Content: quite good but some of the rooms located on the avenue side are really noisy + not so much restaurant in the area

Reviews.Title: “faboulous spot”
Reviews.Author: moylo
Reviews.Content: the hotel is located about ten minutes from centre of barcelona by car but the train station is about five minute walk and a train will take you into centre or the airport. we were met by friendly staff /free internet /rooms modern. It is located in a quiet spot so if you are looking for nightlife it will cost you alot in taxis in and out of town there was no pool but a rooftop jacuzzi with three deckchairs so a bit tight for space up there. They rooms werent that sond proof but we were only there for one night so we werent that disturbed. the staff were very friendly and couldnt do enough for you. overall a good experience

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Katerina_Lakka
Reviews.Content: The first impression of the hotel was very nice, it was very clean, the room had all the comforts, we had a view of a playground and it was really quiet. The stuff was very very friendly and the best thing about the hotel was the breakfast. We even tried the food at noon (great rabbit), but much less options than the morning menu.The hotel is really close to Sants Estacio, a place where you can either take a bus, metro, or train! It s close to every transportation. We would definitely recommend the hotel to anyone who visits Barcelona for the first time. Very good price value!

Reviews.Title: “You get what you pay for”
Reviews.Author: Maxie_7
Reviews.Content: We were given room 212 at the back of the hotel, the room was small but ok for just sleeping etc. The bathroom floor was dirty when we got there and had to ask them to clean it, which they did straight away. Our Fridge didn;t work and it took them nearly 3 days to swap it over. The roof sun area is really small and the hot tub didn't work when we finally got a chance to use it. The breakfast was ok and a good choice of food. You will need earplugs if a light sleeper as you can hear everything, plus our room was over looking a kids playground and the supermarket so really noisey with the food deliveries early in the morning! The staff were really nice and helpfull. As for location it is central but it does take about 40mins to 60 mins to get to Port Olympica and the metro has no aircon so very hot indeed. The trains are nice and cool once you get on them, they are really safe even at 4.00am in the morning! One thing i would say is watch your personal belongings as I was nearly robbed at the bus station as i arrived! And i witnessed someone being pick pocketed on the tour bus as well so be very carefull they wil have your train ticket out of your pocket! All in all it was a good trip and like I said you get what you pay for with this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: Homyak
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel. I completely satisfied with all facilities it provides. The room was clean ( but not spacious), breakfast was excellent, staff was very polite.

Reviews.Title: “Good location not more”
Reviews.Author: berlinilon
Reviews.Content: Had to work in barcelona for a few days and the hotel was close to the office. Room was small and oldfashion. Had an experience at the H10 in madrid (Granvia) and loved it. This one was just regular. The outside terrace was nice.

Reviews.Title: “Almost a perfect stay”
Reviews.Author: MrRedLondon
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights on DBB rate Good Points Located 5 min walk from Sants Estacio station, perfect tourist location, just a few stops on the airport train and connecting with nearly every metro line meaning virtually all of Barcelona is within 15 mins of the hotel. Quiet, safe area despite being close to station. Every member of staff seemed genuinely pleased to help, from check in to check out, especially the Restaurant. Breakfast to rival any 5 star hotel, excellant choice and high quality. DBB Rate can be used for any combination of Breakfast, Lunch or Dinner, a very nice touch! + service times are very conveient with dinner being served up until 11.00pm which was very useful for us, Breakfast is also fully available from 7.00am every day which was again useful on other days. Rooms are well appointed and well maintained Really handy mini-supermarket under the hotel Jacuzzi on the roof, Bad Points Rooms are not sound proofed and the walls are very thin, not a problem if you have quiet people next door to you but could be if you do not. Dinner menu was very limited and not at all in comparison with breakfast, despite the good value i do not recommend the DBB inclusive rate. We took this option because it made great value on the room rate but overall i wouldn't bother, many many great places to eat in Barcelona!!. Cleanliness was average, not bad, but not great either Overall: The good points outweigh the bad, i would recommend this hotel if you get a good deal but i would be reluctant to pay a high rate to stay here again. If you are looking for a tourist base though the location really is ideal as hotels right in the centre can be very expensive!

Reviews.Title: “Highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: EiramS
Reviews.Content: Stayed here three nights recently, excellent value for money, very friendly staff, delicious breakfast buffet, very clean room. The hotel is just five minutes from Estacio Sants metro station, where both the airport bus and the hop-on hop-off tourist bus also stop.

Reviews.Title: “Okay, but some unpleasant problems”
Reviews.Author: VilniusTraveller
Reviews.Content: 1. Our reservation via Active Hotels did not reach the reception desk of the H10 Itaca hotel in Barcelona, though it was done well in advance. I do not know which institution is “guilty” - Active Hotels or H10 staff. Fortunately this problem was solved by the smart guy at the reception, but the fact itself is disappointing (what if there were no free rooms). 2. Room was very small and noisy, overlooking the main street. Of course, in principle one could close the window, and to switch on the ventilation by AC. Unfortunately the noise of the buzzing AC was on the same level as that of the noisy street. 3. The room service was careless. One day we had to ask for the shampoo, etc. 4. There are no carpeting on the floors. It is itself uncomfortable, but the main problem was that the staff usually started cleaning the neighboring rooms very early (even at about 7), loudly sliding the beds, and producing a lot of noise that could be heard in our room. 5. The breakfast was OK, but not extraordinary. We have tasted better ones even in the 3-star hotels. 6. Very expensive for the quality (125 Euros for the small and noisy room). 7. In general, the quality of the hotel is at about 3-star level, and for sure does not reach 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: “Good and bad”
Reviews.Author: CouplePortugal
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for 5 nights. The Good. First of all location was very good - 3 minutes walking to the Sants Station wish gives access to train, bus and metro. Secondly the breakfast at the hotel offers a lot of variety and staff are helpful. The bad: The room faced the road and was extremely noisy - especially as the road seems to be used by every ambulance in Barcelona!! This made it difficult to get a good nights sleep. Secondly, the hotel appears to only have one music CD - which they play in the lift, at breakfast and in all public areas. Must admit that having heard the CD continuously for 5 days - will not be rushing out to buy same CD!!

Reviews.Title: “Overnight Stay”
Reviews.Author: Zeke008
Reviews.Content: We were staying just 1 night, a stop over on the way to our main holiday hotel. The guy at reception was welcoming and very friendly, and offered us a glass of Cava to welcome us which was nice. The room was nice too but very small, I felt quite claustrophobic in it so very glad we weren't there any more than 1 night. Breakfast was fine, nothing startling, just the usual basics. There isn't much nearby, you have to walk a few blocks to get to anywhere with much happening. I would recommend this hotel but only to people staying 1 night.

Reviews.Title: “Extra nice hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Dragan_Dj
Reviews.Content: We spent great 9 days in this hotel and enjoy in very specific, pleasantly and relax atmosphere. Room was very clean, comfortable, with big bathroom and all necessary accessories. Buffet breakfast is excellent with various choices for each taste. Hotel is 5 min by walk from main train station (Sants) and two metro station (Sants and Taragona). Also, if you want to walk you need 40 min to reach Placa Catalunya or 15 min to reach Placa d'Espanya. In same building is supermarket. I could recommend this hotel to everyone and I'll surely stay there during my next visit to Barcelona!

Reviews.Title: “Quite good but..”
Reviews.Author: cinghiali
Reviews.Content: Quite good, near the city centre, but not too clean (for a 4 stars). Moreover there was a lot of noise since there were work in progress at the first floor (for all the 5 days of our stay) and so, from 8 am until 12 am it was IMPOSSIBLE to sleep...it could have been better.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful little hotel - despite rock hard bed”
Reviews.Author: We_heart_adventure
Reviews.Content: We found a great rate on this room (80 Euros a night) using booking.com. The hotel is located very close to Barcelona Sants (the main train station). It was a perfect location for us. We enjoy walking, and were able to walk to all of the tourist sites in Barcelona (it can take up to an hour for those who don't like to walk as much). The room was clean and comfortable with the exception of the rock hard bed. Even with the hard bed, we were not disappointed at all. The bathroom was large and clean. The staff were friendly. The welcome drink was a nice touch. There are computers with Internet in the lobby (free of charge). There is an exercise room on the top floor and a jacuzzi on the roof (although the jacuzzi wasn't working the one night that we wanted to use it). The breakfast at this hotel is second to none. They go way above and beyond any of the other hotels that we have visited. There is a wide assortment of yoghurts, cheese, meats, breads, cereals, vegetables, fruits, hot foods, cakes/croissants/doughnuts, juices, coffees and more. It was really great. We would recommend this hotel to tourists, couples, and business people.

Reviews.Title: “A review from a Canadian - services could improve”
Reviews.Author: WayneOttawa
Reviews.Content: The TV and air conditioner did not work. Both the shower head and water temperature were unstable. The frequent changes water temperature caused significant discomfort.

Reviews.Title: “Not to repeat :(”
Reviews.Author: richeyint
Reviews.Content: I got a good deal for 3 nights but would had preferred to pay more for a nicer hotel. When I got to my room it was so small that there was not even space to put a chair to use the desk to work. I requested a solution and they were very fast assigning me another room with more space and a chair! Internet is fast but it has restrictions to access my work network. It’s the first time it happened to me. I could not use my email for 3 days… This is unacceptable. First nigh there were no black out curtains meaning that I could not sleep with the light. I asked for a protection for the eyes and they were very efficient providing it. A telephone in the corridor was always ringing and as the doors have no sound proof at all. It was a nightmare being waken up all the time. In the morning I mentioned that the mini bar and the scale in the WC were not working. Nothing was done. In the evening I mentioned again the mini bar not working. A made came and just plugged it in a different plug and it started working…. (No follow up at all) Second night they put the black outs but the phone in the corridor was still ringing and worse than that there was a working area just outside the room and the room cleaners were talking very loud all morning. I had to go out and ask them to respect the silence. Reception staff is nice and I did not try breakfast. The location is not very central but this is not a problem at all as there are taxis all the time or you can even walk.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel for a Pretty Good Price”
Reviews.Author: jimcrow21
Reviews.Content: The H10 Itaca Hotel is one of the most beautiful, price-minded hotel I've stayed at in Europe. Rooms are very modern, view is not bad at all, and staff is courteous though finding a English speaking worker can be difficult at times during the night. For about $200 my party managed to get a room with a King sized bed. Bathroom was beautiful but did not have a lock on the door, which I found would be a little weird and a little uncomforting if one is no travelling with a BF, GF, or spouse. Noise from the street is not a problem though the location of the place isn't ideal (nearby attractions are a good deal away, must take cab). Overall if you want a very romantic getaway with modern furnishing and courteous high end service, and isn't super expensive, this is the place to be!

Reviews.Title: “An excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: selma19
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very clean (and I have high standards), the breakfast was diverse enough, all of the staff were very helpful, and especially the reception staff. The hotel is located very close to the central bus station. It is on a busy street, but we've had absolutely no problem with noise. It's not too close to the city center (half an hour's walk), but we were there for a vacation and didn't mind walking at all. La Pedrera is quite near. The price is not excellent I admit, but you do get what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: “Better than you'd think”
Reviews.Author: Rambler
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel for 2 nights as part of a business trip to Barcelona. Having been to this city as a tourist on several previous occasions, I wasn't expecting much from this hotel (which my company chose for me) - mainly due to the location near Sants station. It is true that the location is a little uninspiring and the views to the front of the property are of the main road whilst the rear looks onto apartment blocks. Nevertheless, once inside, the hotel punches above it's weight. Reception is clean,modern and efficient. There is a small bar area with outdoor seating and a friendly (if a little quiet) atmosphere. The rooms are also clean, tidy and with reasonably modern.fittings. Tea making facilities are provided - but no coffee!!. The TV service is ok but not much for English language speakers (or any language other than Spanish for that matter). Breakfast on my first day was fairly extensive and good. Served in a bright restaurant on the first floor. Inexplicably, the next day was poor with no hot food available and no reason given. If you are a tourist, there are better located choices, but don't dismiss this hotel. The price is fair and the metro is nearby. Journeytime to Las Ramblas is just 8 minutes and only 1.25 euro. If you're here for the football, it isn't too far to see Barca either. On the whole, for business this is a good choice. It does everything you need without subjecting you to the nightmare city centre traffic. For the tourist - consider it but bear in mind that you'll need to be hopping on/off the metro regularly.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: buff98216
Reviews.Content: This hotel was everything I wanted. The location is not optimal for those who are on foot, but the main train/subway station, Sants-Estació, less than a 5 minute walk away and from there you can get anywhere in minutes. The staff spoke english very well and was extremely helpful and all areas of the hotel including the rooms were very clean. I especially liked the buffet breakfast which was a little pricey but had anything you would want for breakfast. I have stayed at a few different hotels in Barcelona and this was my favorite by far.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: euro_train_traveller
Reviews.Content: What a great hotel! Everything was excellent from the champagne on arrival to the rooftop jacuzzi (takes a bit of finding - up the stairs from the 7th floor and use your keycard in the door at the top). Spacious air conditioned rooms, free wifi & internet terminals, great buffet breakfast, and unusually for Barcelona, relatively quiet. Will definately be at the top of my list next time I visit Barcelona.

Reviews.Title: “Like noise - this is the hotel for you”
Reviews.Author: perino
Reviews.Content: We arrived late on a Thursday night for a 3 night stay. Got to the room and the air conditioning didn´t work. Called the desk - a/c is off due to it being winter. It was 27 degrees in the room. OK plan b - open the window. Not a good idea, the noise from the road is just beyound normal. We moved to a room on the back for the last two nights, which was not much better. Staff are ok, not great and doesn´t seem to care about guest, this is with the exception of the day time front desk staff who are nice and helpful. This is not a clean hotel and I certainly would not eat the breakfast - if there is any left after 9:30am (!!!). I will never stay at this hotel again and recommend others to insist on a room on the back and that only to stay if a/c is working.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel OK, noisy road”
Reviews.Author: fkaway
Reviews.Content: We, 4 friends, stayed at this hotel in 2 twin bed rooms for a long weekend. The hotel is just minutes away by food from the main train station Sants. A train ride last approx. 20Min. and costs EUR2.50/p.P., our taxi ride back to the airport took approx. 15Min. and costs us EUR18.95. Cabs are cheap in the city, so we only used once the subway. But be aware: taxis are hard to catch in evening/night times, even at this hotel: just be patience! In the very same building you'll find a bank with an ATM and a nice supermarket. In the hotel lobby there are 2 free-internet-stations with a printer, a bar and a terrace, facing the residential area. Our rooms on the 5th floor had a parquet flooring, indoor safe, TV, desk. The generous bathroom with a mirror wall has a hair dryer, dental set, razor set, shoe shining set. In our rooms the AC wasn't working so we needed to sleep with open windows. Unfortunately, the Ave de Roma ist a relatively busy street where many ambulances passed by vocally. The breakfast buffet was ok, could have been more diversified and with a more efficient staff. Generelly spoken, the hotel staff is helpful and friendly. The hotel was ok, neat and absolutely OK für a weekend.

Reviews.Title: “Great Front Desk Staff”
Reviews.Author: BostonTravelerBoston
Reviews.Content: Hotel Stay January 24-29, 2007, H10 Itaca Barcelona. My wife and I, late 40s, experienced travellers, from Boston MA. Plusses: Very helpful and friendly front desk staff. They recommended excellent restaurants (Pexeirot, nearby; La Fonda del Port Olimpic, on the water several miles away), and were very responsive to some noise issues (baby constantly crying in room next door, rude young people talking and smoking in the hall outside our room at 3am). They moved us to a room away from the baby (hotel walls are quite thin and noise carries right through them), and spoke to the rude guests (as did I), who improved their behavior. Breakfast is good (though in our opinion not as outstanding as some have indicated in their reviews), and service friendly. Location was fine for us - near subway and train stations, a stop of the city tourist bus, and a large grocery store. Barcelona is quite large, and has many beautiful, wide boulevards. Our favorite attraction was the Conjunt Monumental de la Placa del Rei, just off Les Ramblas. It features a catwalk tour 'above' ruins of the old Roman city of Barcino - fascinating. The MNAC (National Museum), on the other hand, was a disappointment - but the building itself, and the views from it, are inspiring. The MNAC and Place Espanyol are a short walk from the hotel. The location felt safe to us as well, and we often walked in this area at night, and other areas of Barcelona, without incident. Free wireless access a big plus, though strength of signal and speed of access varied quite a bit. There are also two PCs in the lobby for guests, with a printer. The staff in the restaurant was also very friendly and efficient at breakfast each morning. Another excellent restaurant: Tragaluz, near the Diagonal subway station (Passatge de la Conceptio 5, 93-487-01-96). Our meal was terrific, and the restaurant is beautiful (as is Pexeirot, which also has a pianist every night). Keep in mind that folks eat late in Spain - many restaurants do not open until 8:30pm, and even then you'll likely be eating without many others until 9:00, 9:30 or even later. Negatives: Small rooms, uncomfortable (hard) beds (we found this to be the case in all 3 hotels we stayed at in Spain - each supposed to be rated 4 stars), and very thin walls that allow normal conversation - and lots more - to be easily heard in the next room. The noise from the street (front side of hotel) and a playground/common area (back side of hotel) could interfere with sleep if you like the window open. And the windows - the drapes are installed in such a a way that they interfere with the way the window opens, which was a bit of a pain. Overall, we liked the hotel, most especially because the staff was very helpful and friendly. Great rates at Otel.com ($107 US per night, inclusive of breakfast and all taxes). Watch out for the cab drivers. While we had several good ones, we had several who were obviously dismissive of US tourists, and one who outright tried to cheat us. The subway system is fast, inexpensive and efficient, though we did not get to use it as much as we had intended.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: FiveTimesWinners
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel via lastminute.com and got a room including breakfast on a Sunday night for £45, much reduced on the advertised rate. As away from the main tourist area, restaurants are somewhat scarse. However we found a nice Chinese just around the corner (turn left out of hotel, then left at lights) which worked out at less than £15 for starters, two main meals and a couple of drinks.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good stay”
Reviews.Author: annchgo
Reviews.Content: I stayed here on business for a week. Everything was clean, updated and the staff was generally friendly (with some exceptions). We used the parkage garage, which was convenient. It was also handy to have a bank and a grocery store all right in the same property, so ATM withdrawels and grabbing bottled water was no problem. The only problem is that the hotel itself isn't really near any of the Barcelona sites. We did walk every evening to Las Ramblas, so it is walkable, but a bit of a hike. The train station is not too far away and there are some restaurants in that area as well (we ate at a good middle eastern place in that area). It was easy to get to the airport from the hotel. And the hotel restaurant was very good. I had a room on the back of the hotel and it was very quiet. The front of the hotel faces a major roadway, but I do not know if rooms on that side have more noise or not.

Reviews.Title: “Good but not 4 star”
Reviews.Author: Vvegas
Reviews.Content: A nice basic hotel with friendly staff. Clean and comfortable and probably merits a 3 star. Excellent breakfasts. 5 minute walk from railway station so connecting to the airport is easy and cheap (2.4 Euros). Taxi rates to airport varied from 22 Euro to 34 Euro depending on the driver !! If using the metro or buses be careful of pickpockets. Don't trust anyone in the streets anywhere in Barcelona, even people pretending to be tourists asking for directions. We were mugged and duped for cash by fake policemen. Barcelona is an excellent place with many good places to visit but majority of the locals are undesirable. Con artists everywhere and police not interested unless you lose your passport or credit cards. Beware!!!

Reviews.Title: “Fine Hotel but a beat far from centre”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We are from Lisbon, Portugal We liked the Hotel, but it´s a beat far from center. At night is ok, no noise. But if you want to dinner near by you dont have many choices, only small cafés.

Reviews.Title: “Great Breakfasts!”
Reviews.Author: columbusrobbie
Reviews.Content: Pleasant staff. Rooms are well priced and very comfortable. The breakfasts were fantastic and although we didn't use the restaurant, the menus were varied and appeared to represent good value. This hotel gives the impression that it's a business rather than leisure hotel, but there was a very warm welcome from the reception staff and there were plenty of tourists staying while we were there. The hotel is slightly out of the old centre of Barcelona but is just a couple of hundred metres from the Metro and the main line that curves around past Montjuic and Las Ramblas along through Placa Catalunya. It's handily placed for sight seeing. Also, just a short 10 minute walk from Barcelona Sants train station, so easy to get to from the airport by train if you prefer. All in all, cracking value if you're not paying full price for the room and it won't disappoint. Prior to going, I read a review on here that it's noisy, but I found it no more noisy than most city centre hotels I've stayed in.

Reviews.Title: “Very Noisy at Night”
Reviews.Author: E Hannigan
Reviews.Content: We booked a three night stay in this Hotel at the end of February. Our main complaint was in relation to the noise. The first night we stayed apparently there was a match on in Barcelona and certain guests staying on our floor who were there for the night and the match kept us awake until 4.30 a.m. I actually had to go out myself and ask them to stay quiet - not what you want on your holidays. The second night was much better only be woken by maids servicing the bedroom above us (wooden floors - do not help) at about 7 a.m. We were again kept awake again on our final night by guests running around corridors and in and out of rooms around us. Did find staff very pleasant but wish that the night staff would patrol more and be effective in keeping noise at bay. Although we did complain at Reception about the noise - did not get much sympathy. Breakfast good and location although a litte far out of town not the worst.

Reviews.Title: “5 star service”
Reviews.Author: los_santos
Reviews.Content: I had very nice business/culture experience in Barcelona this week. I booked hotel Itaca through h10.es website, room prices on double for single use were 67 euros for two nights and 83 e for last night including breakfast buffee. What you´ll get is five star service for price of three or four. Free Cava for welcoming and on breakfast though other guests were quite passive having a free drink. There is a large supermercado around the corner where you can get drinks, crisps etc. cheaply so you don´t have to pay high minibar prices. Room was small but comfortable. Bathroom was equipped with toiletries and many towels. No bathrobe though. Breakfast buffee was standard, greasy scrambled eggs and bacon to satisfy british customers. Coffee pot was served to table but coffee was only warm not hot. Location of hotel Itaca is very good. Avinguada de Roma is busy street but noise isn´t so much issue. It is couple of hundred meters to Barcelo Sants train station and to metro. It took about 30 minutes to walk to the Catalonia plaza. Taxi costs from 6 to 9 euros.

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: PepeMiami
